msItem.title: Ma'athir al-Umara.
msItem.note: F1a: Signature of A.G. Ellis dated 18.3.09. Sheet bound in before f1a: a) Signature of Ellis as above. b) Note in Persian dated 6 April 1846 describing the work. F371a: Impression of rectangular seal: I'timad al-Daula. (Probably occurs on other MS but not read) F371b: In Ellis's hand: Luzac (Sotheby - Alexander). This is of the earlier edition, produced by Ghulam 'Ali 'Azad' Bilgrami. It is older than any listed by Storey. The manuscript was written at the suggestion of Mirza Muhammad Khan Bahadur Saulat Jang. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: English calf binding with tooled spine.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
